data_description.host: Hostname or IP address of SSH/SFTP Server to connect to.
data_description.port: Port of your SSH/SFTP Server. This is usually 22.
data_description.password: Password to authenticate with. Provide this or Private Key File
data_description.private_key_file: Location to private key file to authenticate with. File must be uploaded to Home Assistant /config folder. Provide this or password.
data_description.backup_location: Remote path where to upload backups.

error.os_error: {error_message}. Please check if host and/or port are correct.
error.sftp_no_such_file: Could not check directory {backup_location}. Make sure directory exists.
error.unknown: Unexpected exception ({exception}) occurred during config flow. {error_message}

abort.already_configured: Integration already configured. Host with same address, port, username and backup location already exists.
